about_the_game:
On an abandoned countryside in rural America. Among cryptic notes left by your late grandfather. Ghostly shadows and lights in the dark, overshadows the lights of the heart.

Contact is an exploration and puzzle based psychological horror experience. It's a game about immersion, problem solving, exploring a farm that is ever-changing, abandoned and yet alive. Experience nightmares both imagined and real, sleeping and awake. Interact with the environment and gather information to uncover the secret that the farm hides in the dark. Tension abound will slowly build as darkness gathers around.

Many locked doors lie within, and a large field of crops, lay await outside. A shadow at the corner of your eye. A creaking under the floor. The howling carried in the wind. The rustling in the field.

...Are you alone?

Using physics based puzzles and environments, cutting edge dynamic lighting, player responsive AI and a modular soundtrack, this game will stop at nothing to make you feel the tension and unease of the nightmare.

NOTE: The game is focused on exploration and puzzle solving to progress through its story. Building up the tension slowly and relying on the players attention to details. The game also requires the player to interact with the environment under pressure which requires the player to notice smaller differences under stress.. This can be a hard game, in unconventional ways.

FEATURES

  • Player responsive AI Presence that reacts to the player.
  • Physics based interaction system.
  • Immersive Realism.
  • Modular music guiding the player.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3550H 2.10 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: A first person horror adventure set on a farmstead. Make yourself at home and unravel the mystery. Solve the puzzles, escape the nightmares, and by all means, stay clear of the fields.
